caller_intent: The caller wants to adjust her insurance policy by removing her father from the current policy and creating a new one for him, while keeping herself and her sister on the same policy with their 2016 Lexus. She also wants to explore deductible changes to reduce costs.
resolution_steps: Agent pulls up the caller's renewal policy to review current details.
Confirms vehicle and driver information (2016 Lexus shared with sister, 2006 Lexus for father).
Discusses removing father from the current policy and creating a new policy for him with the 2006 Lexus.
Agrees to keep the same coverage levels (100/500 deductible) but explores increasing deductibles for cost savings.
Mentions shopping with other carriers for comparison.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy structure (multiple drivers/vehicles, deductible adjustments)
Process for splitting policies between family members
summary: The caller is adjusting her insurance policy to separate her father's coverage into a new policy while keeping her and her sister on the same policy. The agent is confirming details, discussing deductible changes, and will provide a quote after reviewing the new policy structure.
